TitlePage.Title: GaussForHomalg
TitlePage.Subtitle: Gauss functionality for the homalg project
TitlePage.Author:
Simon Görtzen
Simon Görtzen
Lehrstuhl B fuer Mathematik, RWTH Aachen
Templergraben 64
52062 Aachen
Germany
simon.goertzen@rwth-aachen.de https://www.linkedin.com/in/simongoertzen/
TitlePage.Abstract: This document explains the primary uses of the &GaussForHomalg; package. Included in this manual is a documented list of the most important methods and functions you will need.

TitlePage.Acknowledgements: Many thanks to Mohamed Barakat and the Lehrstuhl B für Mathematik at RWTH Aachen University in general for their support. It should be noted that &GaussForHomalg; is dependant on the &GAP; &MatricesForHomalg; package by M. Barakat et al. , as well as the &Gauss; package by myself . This should be clear as &GaussForHomalg; presents a link between these two packages. This manual was created with the help of the &GAPDoc; package by M. Neunhöffer and F. Lübeck .
